greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n = abcd... in decimal, a(n) = |a^2-b^2+c^2-d^2+...|.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: f s x = s * d ^ 2 + f (negate s) x' where (x', d) = divMod x 10
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 10 2015
